pageTitle: Drip Irrigation System for Raised Bed Gardening - Raised Bed Drip Irrigation System Irrigation Direct
textBeforeTable: Included in the Kit: Need more of a particular item? Click the KIT PARTS tab above to add them to your cart. Maximum Flow Rate Required when the raised bed drip irrigation system is fully installed (all drippers and soaker hose): 325 gph (2 circuits). You are not limited to 4 ft x 8 ft boxes, but keep in mind that the maximum run length for the 1/4” drip emitter tubing with 6” emitter spacing is 19 linear feet. The max run for the 12” emitter spacing is 33 feet. This drip irrigation system contains everything you will need to go from hose bibb (faucet) into your raised garden beds. Waters up to 12 boxes and 50 plants. Each raised bed drip irrigation system kit uses a combination of drip emitters and drip emitter tubing. The number of boxes & plants that can be watered with each raised bed drip irrigation system is an estimate based on the total number of drip emitters & feet of emitter tubing provided in the drip irrigation system. A Drip Pro Water timer (DD-DWT673) can be purchased separately. Product Description Note:  Based on 4 ft. x 8 ft. raised planter boxes. -- Jumbo kit is designed to make two separate systems. Expert Advice Kit Parts Details Instructions Overview //]]>
textAfterTable: Drip Irrigation System Installation Manual   Drip Irrigation Kit Raised Bed Gardening Models: □ Starter Kit:  3 boxes + 10 Plants (DK-BGS) □ Medium Kit: 6 boxes + 20 Plants (DK-BGM) □ Large Kit: 6 boxes + 30 Plants (DK-BGL) □ Extra Large Kit: 9 boxes + 40 Plants (DK-BGXL) □ Jumbo Kit: 12 boxes + 50 Plants (DK-BGJO) Based on 4 ft. x 8 ft. raised planter boxes Description This raised bed drip irrigation system contains everything you will need to go from your hose bibb (faucet) into your raised garden beds. Each raised bed drip irrigation kit uses a combination of drip emitters and drip emitter tubing. The number of plants that can be watered with each drip irrigation kit is an estimate based on the number of drip emitters provided in the kit. The number of 4 ft x 8 ft raised beds that can be watered is based on the linear feet of emitter tubing provided and spacing the tubing rows about 10 inches apart. If you want to automate your raised bed drip system, a  Drip Pro Water timer (DD-DWT673)  can be purchased separately.   Maximum Flow Rate Required when the raised bed drip irrigation system is fully installed (all drippers and/or soaker hose): Starter Kit: 55 gph, Medium Kit: 150 gph, Large Kit: 165 gph, Extra Large Kit: 220 gph, Jumbo Kit:
